payment_address.label: Основной инпут
payment_address.newElement:
{tag: 'div',props: {className: 'form-group'},child: '
    '}

payment_address.label: Город
payment_address.prefetch: return { locations: [ JSON.parse(target.getAttribute('data-dadata')) ], from_bound: { 'value': 'city' }, to_bound: { 'value': 'city' }, restrict_value: true, query: '' }
payment_address.callback: let res = (helper('city_fias_id', suggest, true) || helper('area_fias_id', suggest, true) || helper('region_fias_id', suggest, true)); element.setAttribute('data-dadata', res);

payment_address.label: Адрес
payment_address.callback: let res = (helper('settlement_fias_id', suggest, true) || helper('city_fias_id', suggest, true)); element.setAttribute('data-dadata', res);

payment_address.callback: let res = (helper('settlement_fias_id', suggest, true) || helper('city_fias_id', suggest, true)); element.setAttribute('data-dadata', res);
